content.webTitle: 'Easy to meet, hard to stay together': share your stories

fields.headline: 'Easy to meet, hard to stay together': share your stories
fields.bodyText: If there’s anything this global pandemic has made us realise, it’s the importance of maintaining strong connections with those we love. We could all learn from those who’ve managed to create an enduring relationship, through good times and bad. Those couples who have been through disasters, conflict and other misfortunes – and still want to be in the same room together, most of the time anyway. Share your story If you and your partner would like to share your story, please get in touch. We’re keen to hear from couples of all backgrounds and orientations – especially if your relationship is non-traditional. Tell us about what you’ve learnt and we may interview you two for our How we stay together series. Please provide as much detail as you can in the form below, as well as an email address that you check regularly. If you’re having trouble using the form, click here. Read terms of service here.
